features: Ideal for kid and baby congestion symptom relief, with Natural Saline that helps clean and dissolve snot and boogers.
Made with 0.9% isotonic saline, which is the same amount of saline that naturally occurs in the human body.
Soothes and moisturizes with Aloe, Chamomile, and Vitamin E, so wipes are extra soft, safe and gentle for all ages.
Hypoallergenic and free of alcohol, parabens, sulfates, chlorine and phthalates.
Hard top, re-sealable packs keep wipes moist and gentle, and are perfect for having fresh wipes handy when cold and flu symptoms are at their worst.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Safe & gentle for all ages Soothe and moisturize with extra soft wipes made with Aloe, Chamomile, and Vitamin E. Isotonic Saline Our patented saline formula is made with 0.9% isotonic saline, which is the same amount of saline that naturally occurs in the human body Flip-top lid keeps wipes fresh Perfect for stuffy noses when allergy, cold and flu symptoms are at their worst Hypoallergenic Free of alcohol, parabens, and phthalates. Available in unscented and scents kids love!

Boogie Saline Nose Wipes Boogie Micro-Mist Saline Inhaler Boogie Saline Nasal Mist Boogie Saline Nose Drops Boogie Chest Rub Boogie Stuffy Nose Kit What It Does Breaks down dried, stuck-on boogers without irritation and wipes away dirt and germs Gently moisturizes and soothes the upper respiratory tract Gently cleans and clears nasal passages in mist form Gently cleans and clears nasal passages in drop form Soothes and comforts when irritated by congestion and other cold symptoms Contains stuffy nose solutions to ease congestion

Boogie No-Rub Diaper Rash Spray Boogie Organic Diaper Balm Boogie Antibacterial Hand Wipes Boogie Hand Sanitizer Spray Boogie Balm What It Does Helps treat & prevent diaper rash Mosturizes and nourishes skin to help prevent dryness and chapping Wipes away dirt, germs and bacteria when soap and water are not available. Quickly decreases bacteria on the hands and body Mosturizes and nourishes skin to help prevent dryness and chapping

Boogie Bath Bombs Boogie Bath Salts Boogie Bubble Bath Boogie Insect Repellent Lotion Boogie Sunscreen Stick What It Does Soothes and comforts Soothes and comforts Helps soothe, comfort and relieve when congestion, cold, flu and allergy symptoms are at their worst. Provides broad-spectrum protection for the whole family and effectively repels mosquitoes and ticks for up to 14 hours. Contains 20% Picaridin, No DEET Provides broad spectrum SPF 50 to help prevent sunburn

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are gentle to little noses and grown up noses
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are amazing to keep your nose from chafing. No one likes a little red nose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these little wipes! They are gentle, mild, and good for everything! This is going to sound odd but one of my favorite things about them is the sturdy packaging. I had another wipe that was just normal saline (not wanting to name names, but it was a major name brand) and the top kept coming loose and falling off. these come in a really sturdy flip top that can take a beating and still keep the wipes fresh. I hope they never change that. I also love the Boogie Butt Spray, such an awesome, easy solution, but I'll save that for a future review! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps with stuffy noses
reviews.reviewText: Always have these on hand especially during winter months. Smells great, helps with both runny and stuffy noses. Won't scratch or leave irritated. My boys always ask for their boogie wipes when they're not feeling well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE boogie wipes!
reviews.reviewText: My family couldn't live without Boogie Wipes! When my 3 year old gets sick, his nose runs a LOT. And wiping his nose with tissues leaves his nose raw! Wiping with these leaves his nose feeling better than before it was wiped and I swear that somehow the saline in these HELPS the mucus get released from his nose quicker, too. Love love love this product! It's great for adults, too!-As a wife and as a mom of 3 kids, I spend a lot of time shopping for deals on the best products out there for my family. It's important to me that if we're spending our hard earned money that we get a top notch product in return. I often rely on the reviews and opinions of others when contemplating purchasing a new product that I haven't tried before myself. Because of that, any products that I buy (whether on Amazon or from a 3rd party) I always make sure to leave a detailed review of the product to help others when selecting items to purchase, as well. My family tests these products fully before forming a solid opinion and writing a review. When I write a review, I keep in mind that those reading are also looking for honesty about the product and want an unbiased opinion to go by. If my review has been helpful to you, please give me a "Yes" vote on my review. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars sweet relief! The cooling moisture made me want to ...
reviews.reviewText: When I had my first child, I thought, "OMG, how silly! New parents will fall for any gimmick to take their money!" Now we have 2 kids, a 5-year-old and an infant. We have ALL caught EVERY. SINGLE. COLD. this winter! I'm seriously considering burning down the house and starting over in a cleanroom!Anyway, the pediatrician's office has a sample display of these, so I grabbed a couple when we were there for one of the innumerable visits we've had over the past year. Fast-forward to a day when both kids and I had noses so sore we could scarcely LOOK at TP or tissues without crying a little. So, I grabbed one of the sample packs and opened it, tentatively revealing the life-changing contents. I closed my eyes, took a deep breath, and placed the moist towelette to my nostrils. Then, I wiped. And I wiped again! And I blew and wiped! Oh, sweet relief! The cooling moisture made me want to strap one of these puppies to my face and leave it there all day!Only after I was sold on these for myself, I tried one on the baby. Her reflex to cry at having her nose wiped was quickly reversed to a look of peace and tranquility (well, as peaceful and tranquil as a sick baby can look...). The 5-year-old now asks for Boogie Wipes by name!I would pay TWICE this much for these! Don't listen to the haters who say, "OMG, you fell for that?!?!? Who needs special wet wipes for their nose, anyway?" This is worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for many uses!
reviews.reviewText: These work wonders for my 3 month old. I was using sensitive baby wipes to wipe her face when needed and it seemed to break her out, these work so much better! She seems to like them better as well, they leave her skin soft and the smell is very gentle which is a plus in my book!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than HIGH END FACIAL CARE Products - Has helped my face look better, younger...wonderful. MANY USES, too!
reviews.reviewText: Use for EVERYTHING....Am almost 50 years old and has helped my oily/sensitive skin perk up significantly. LOVE THESE.Great not just for face...but for hands, body...then use the used one to wipe up a spot on the floor, sink, even spots on clothing.Have bought high-end facial wipes and skin care products....BUT NOW, will never leave these out of my routine.The key is the saline - which as a nurse, we use all the time as a disinfectant - (we touch our faces sooo much-spreading bacteria to out pores)!....But it is not drying because the the soothing aloe,chamomile, and vitamin E.They are on my subscribe and save...FOREVER!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this product for my son when he’s sick and has a runny nose. I won’t use any other product.
Great product to have when baby is congested

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 21, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Very useful for runny noses, and not only! My child loves them, and they make her feel happy to blow her nose! The scent is wonderful, and to be honest, now the whole family uses them!!!! I am a returning customer myself, so I highly recommend this product!

reviews.reviewTitle: Making a horrible situation slightly better.
reviews.reviewText: So our 1 year old daughter has seemingly begun to pull large, slug sized boogers from her nose in recent weeks. This has been troubling on so many levels. Sometimes you witness it live, other times you'll find one dried to the rim of your glasses hours later. Somewhere in all of this, I've become responsible for the cleanup of the majority of these nightmare-inducing souvenirs. These wipes help with that and they also have this weirdly likable scent to them. 5/5.
